Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: SB 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Coles, 75th and South Shore due to, street blockage near  South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Coles, 75th and South Shore due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
